title: J.K. Rowling Posts New Harry Potter Short Story
teaser: Harry Potter is attending the Quidditch World Cup with his family, as well as Ron and Hermione. He is in his 30s, with "a couple of threads of silver" in his hair and a mysterious cut on his cheek.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
